name: leagueoverallpergametopplayers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool basketapi.
Tool description: BasketAPI provides you with live basketball results, schedule and matches that are being played or was played in a date. With over 70 different basketball leagues, among which are college basketball league (NCAA Men and NCAA Women), NBA, Euroleague, A1, Serie A, Liga ACB, Eurocup, ABA Liga, NBB and many other, you can follow live scores, results, tables, statistics, fixtures, standings and previous results by quarters, halftime or final result. BasketAPI has everything you need!
For increased...
API description: Retrieves the best players in a basketball league per game for a specific tournament and season.

tournamentid.description: The unique identifier for the tournament to retrieve the league's best players.

seasonid.description: The unique identifier for the season to retrieve the league's best players.
